title: Stars
description: Stars are the diamonds in the dark sky at night. They bring light to the heart of people and the artist loves starts.

title: Planets
description: Space is a mystery place and attracts many scientists and artists. The artist used her imagination to explore and depict the space in her heart.

title: Red bird
description: Birds are the spirits of freedom. This red bird is a window to the deep heart of the artist who loves freedom and dreams to fly in the sky.

title: Happy Meal
description: Depicting the fries with flowers in a cat-shaped plate shows the child part of the artist.

title: Yellow cat
description: Cats are the favorite animals of Arabella the Artist. She has drawn tons of cats. This yellow cat stares at us in a wild space, which shows the love of freedom air.

title: Cat's house
description: Not only does the artist loves cats, but also she loves to draw cat's life. This house is a home for one of her cat.

title: Sunflower in Storm
description: In the artist's artwork, she has drawn lots of plants. Among those, this sunflower is very special. It represents the toughness and bravery of the artist.

title: Flamingo and fish
description: This is a funny portrait. A flamingo is talking to a fish under beautiful sunshine. This is a very interesting moment and shows the kindness of the artist.

title: Chasing
description: In a sunny day, a snake is chasing a mummy cat and her baby cat. High up in the tree, a mummy bird is flying back to her nest to feed her baby bird.

title: Friends
description: In real life, cats don't usually get along well with dogs. However, in the eyes of the artist, they are friends.

title: A sunny day
description: Bright sunshine, white clouds, blue sky and a happy cat. In the artist's heart, she is that happy cat.

title: Silence
description: A house stands on the grass alone without people or animals. Everything is so quite and silent. Amid the busy life, we also need a place to relax.
